title: Midterm Results Indicate Shift In Democrat's Voting Coalition
teaser: Steve Inskeep talks to demographic specialists about election results. They include: the Pew Research Center's Mark Hugo Lopez, Andra Gillespie of Emory University and Abby Kiesa of Tufts University.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
